segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, not noticing the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water yet, it's so messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a tipping stool, reaching for the cookies, it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to fall and hurt himself if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what the woman is going to do when she finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a bit gross, with all the water on the floor and her not noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really tell her about the water and the children before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
